root.name: Gran Turismo 3 A-Spec
root.description: Gran Turismo is a racing game for the Playstation 2 game console. It sells itself as being 'the real driving simulator.' There are just over 150 cars available in Gran Turismo 3, including Formula 1 cars. Almost every available vehicle can be upgraded and have settings such as downforce, suspension and gearing tweaked. Gran Turismo 3 includes an arcade mode and Gran Turismo mode. ArcadeAllows players to choose a vehicle and a track and then either race against CPU controlled cars, another human player, or on their own in order to try and set a new track record.Gran TurismoThis is similar to a story or career mode. The player begins with a set amount of credits with which to buy their first car. They may then enter races in order to win cars and/or money which can then be used to buy better cars or upgrade current ones. As players complete the easier races and tournaments, they will need to start passing license tests in order to advance to more difficult tournaments.Gran Turismo 3 is frequently cited as being the
